document.full_text: does the social-media stream of updates from facebook, twitter, instagram and their ilk afflict you with a sense that you're missing out on something better? discuss your strategies for coping with this modern-day dilemma.
document.title: do social networks make you feel left out?
lines_and_colors: does the social-media stream of updates from facebook, twitter, instagram and their ilk afflict you with a sense that you're missing out on something better? discuss your strategies for coping with this modern-day dilemma.
